ModMetadata.Name: Inventory Tweaks
ModMetadata.Author: theit8514
ModMetadata.Description: [h1]Inventory Tweaks[/h1] This mod is designed to improve the inventory management aspect of Stationeers. [h2]Requirements[/h2] WARNING: This is a StationeersLaunchPad Plugin Mod. It requires BepInEx to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad Detailed installation instructions available here: https://github.com/theit8514/Stationeers-InventoryTweaks#installation-steam-workshop [h2]Features[/h2] * Combine items into existing stacks when moving via Smart Stow (default G) * Add keybind for hitting "Next" on your current active item (for example, the Advanced Tablet) * Fixes weird gaps between inventory windows * Fixes tracking of original slots so that items return to their proper place via Smart Stow. * Ability to lock slots to an item type (e.g. Hand Drill, Cable Coil, etc.). Hover over the slot using Alt and press keybind to lock/unlock. * Override Inventory Select keybind to allow swapping when Invalid slot selected (e.g. trying to swap non-tool into a tool slot) [h2]License[/h2] This mod is open source and available from [url=https://github.com/theit8514/Stationeers-InventoryTweaks]theit8514/Stationeers-InventoryTweaks[/url] on GitHub
ModMetadata.ChangeLog:

0.4.4: - Fixed NRE with Inventory Select on an empty slot of a type not matching the item type

0.4.2: - Fixed Stationeers crashes when mod is uninstalled. This change requires InventoryTweaks save data to be migrated. - Fixed duplicate harmony patching if installed multiple times.
0.4.1: - Published to Steam Workshop
0.4.0: - Updated for Stationeers "Biggest Update Ever" - Fixed Open Slot detection for tools, adding items with hash "None" - Updated to new save format - Fixed lock slots being filled with Smart Stow
